channel.title: admin on Digital space of K. Bret Staudt Willet
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Digital space of K. Bret Staudt Willet

item.description: Hi, I’m Bret. Read my CV, download a PDF copy, or download a two-page resume version. I start as a tenure-track Assistant Professor of Instructional Systems & Learning Technologies at Florida State University in August 2021. I hold a Ph.D. in Educational Psychology & Educational Technology, a Master’s Degree in Educational Technology, and a Graduate Certificate in Serious Game Design and Research from Michigan State University, and a bachelorâ€™s degree in mathematics and sociology from Bucknell University.
